website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for campers, RVs, cabins, and other places where full-size freezers are impractical. Among the pricier models, but worth the investment for its water recycling abilities.
pros: We like the innovative way it recycles melted water into new cubes
cons: Unit is well-insulated but not a true freezer
Users must transfer existing ice in order to create new cubes
10-minute wait for first cubes to form

customer_reviews.title: This is better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is better than I expected! Once this machine "warms up" it's certainly produces the ice! And I love how it holds almost a gallon of water so you don't have to keep refilling it up every hour or so. The large ice cube size is about the same size as you will find at most grocery stores, while the small and medium ones are about the size of the ones you get at the restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: Master Prime

customer_reviews.title: Super fast shipment
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipment, so easy to use. Hated going to the store to buy a bag a ice, and living like 3 minutes from the store would still have ice melting so ended up 1 huge ice cube. This ice maker makes it so much nicer. Don't ever have to worry again about running out of ice. The shapes of the cubes make them so easy to use them in a soda or water bottle. I looked through slot of different portable ice makers, and this had everything I wanted, 3 sizes of cubes, recycling the water as the ice melts, very portable, easy to use, and a easy drain spout. I highly recommended this one
customer_reviews.author: Cosmomom 3

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I start it when i get up in ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I start it when i get up in the morning and within 10-15 minutes I have ice. I am a big ice eater so I run it through out the day but it sometimes gets ahead of me and I have too much ice(but I guess that is not a problem!). The ice is soft, white in color and is the softer kind of ice by which i compare to clear ice which is harder if that makes any sense.
customer_reviews.author: mary watson

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until the warranty expired
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for just under a year and a half. The auto-stop stopped working, and it kept making ice until the back water tray stopped moving and broke. Then, I couldn’t get Edgestar to respond timely to repeated voice and email messages. Considering it was going to cost as much to fix it as to buy a new one, I told Edgestar I would buy a new one, but this time not an Edgestar.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bradley

customer_reviews.title: The ice maker work great when I first got
customer_reviews.text: The ice maker work great when I first got. The water pump would make a grinding sound off and on but still worked. Now the The ice is coming out paper thin. I call customer service; and they suggested that I clean it with a vinegar solution; which I did; and now it does not make ice at all. The other problem is the drain. They suggest that you drain it every day and put in fresh water. The only problem is the drain is too slow and takes forever.
customer_reviews.author: William L. Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Except for the hot running they are great little ice makers and well worth the money especially ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these we purchased,. The first one lasted about five years. The second one lasted about only two years. Probably our fault we didn't leave enough space around it to allow the heat to dissipate ( they do run hot). We have place this one differently with more free space around it and it seems to be running cooler. Except for the hot running they are great little ice makers and well worth the money especially if you can find them on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Randy D.

customer_reviews.title: Ice Machine Meets Our Needs
customer_reviews.text: This unit is compact enough to sit on the counter without a problem. The unit makes plenty enough ice to support the polar ice machine my husband has to use post surgically. The machine runs quietly and you only hear it when it dumps the ice cubes into the storage bucket. The size of the cubes can fit into 1 quart water bottles. If you don't use the ice it melts and remakes into ice again, no waste. Thank you for a wonderful machine.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Larkins

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The house we recently moved into (renting) has an older fridge, that does not have an ice maker. Our family uses a lot of ice, so constantly filling ice trays isn't always quick enough. This ice machine gets a lot of use, and we are all very happy with it. We don't have a lot of counter space, and it eats up about the same amount of space as a small microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Holman

customer_reviews.title: So glad we bought this!
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite kitchen appliance. Makes great tasting ice quickly & efficiently. Be sure to use distilled water to make ice, as tap or even filtered water tends to come out cloudy and taste less than ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Barrows-Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this product. Mine stopped making ice after 2 weeks. I've had cheaper versions that at least lasted longer. And the company customer service refused to just let me return the product. They wanted me to get it repaired through edgestar which says the buyer is responsible to cover shipping for the repair
customer_reviews.author: bizzyg

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, produces enough ice for our family of 5. you definitely need to dump and store your ready made ice or it will melt. It's a great little ice maker!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: The first one that was sent did not work. ...
customer_reviews.text: The first one that was sent did not work. The replacement unit works well. It allows you to program 3 different sizes of ice, and it quickly fills the tray. The one negative for this machine is that the drain plug is very hard to unscrew and screw back on.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki J. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Ice when I need it.
customer_reviews.text: I travel often and need ice for drinks on the road. I can anticipate my needs and bag what I need a couple of days before I go. Just right for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Official

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This machine works as stated. Nothing special. I really am looking for a machine that makes 'soft' ice for munching on. One reviewer stated that this machine is good for that. It isn't. These cubes are hard and 'glassy'. This machine is ok, but won't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Beaverhausen

customer_reviews.title: You won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: This ice maker is the best we've tried so far! It really IS everything they say and then some. Highly recommend it! I like the fact that they actually address the fact that it needs to be cleaned from time to time so that you don't end up with mildew or mold or who knows what else. Just a little added peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: BadDog

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I love this ice maker! As a matter of fact, this is my second one! The last one I had lasted for many years! The only difference is the color. You can't go wrong buying this machine.
customer_reviews.author: I Love GOD

customer_reviews.title: Grwat little icemaker
customer_reviews.text: This ice box performs wonderfully, making ice quickly and efficiently.. It is perfect for our use, we bag the cubes and put the in our freezer. Would give it 5 stars, but it I don't consider it portable and you can't put it on a counter with overhead cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Cacciolfi

customer_reviews.title: EdgeStar portable countertop ice maker
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this ice maker. We go through a lot of ice. Used to have to keep a bag of ice in our garage refrigerator. Not anymore. This appliance makes quickly, perfect for us!
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This came before the expected delivery date. I use it everyday, works like a charm. I've had no problems with it. I recommend it and would buy it again. It exceeded my expectations, do yourself a favor and purchase one.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly J

customer_reviews.title: A Fan!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE it! This is our second one. The first one was a gift and we just bought a new one. The first ice maker lasted 5 years. It's a super product! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Marshall-Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Great little ice machine for a small home bar
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friend who loves it. Made a great addition to her bar area. Multiple ice sizes and good turn around makes it perfect for what she was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Talk about easy. Take it out of the box, clean it, plug it in, put water in and turn it on. Done!! You have ice. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Best Ice Maker
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. It will be for a couple of family members Christmas presents. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes

customer_reviews.title: It works and keeps up
customer_reviews.text: This is the second product i have gotten through these folks. Both have worked incredibly well. I saw the ice maker at a friend's lake house and was impressed how it kept up. We tend to go through a fair amount of ice, and our in door ice makers dont have the volume. Plus this ice maker allows me to move the bar to our screen porch or patio.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Ungemach

customer_reviews.title: Works very nice
customer_reviews.text: Produces ice every 9-11 minutes. Little noisy but works very well. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Laura Haworth

customer_reviews.title: Portable icemaker
customer_reviews.text: I could not get it to work. It made two ice cubes and said to add water. I left it unplugged over night and it still mades 2 -3 ice cubes and red light comes on to add water. I turned it upside down to drain the water and it had Some yellow stuff on the bottom of it . Now I'm not sure if that was used or new.
customer_reviews.author: JACQUELINE CARTER

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: The EdgeStar runs quietly and makes Ice very fast. Our refrigerater ice maker was real slow and we had to ration the ice to get through the day. With this ice maker we use all the ice we want and it is filled back up whenever we need it.
customer_reviews.author: Dean M. Roadifer

customer_reviews.title: Died after 13 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a little over a year... but would have expected at least 5 years of use.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.B.

customer_reviews.title: works great!!
customer_reviews.text: works great!!! a friend had one in their motorhome and we got one for ours - - amazing!!! buying another one right now for our vacation home and our primary home
customer_reviews.author: Jan O'gORMAN

customer_reviews.title: Makes ice
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son. He likes it a lot. Ice all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Iselt

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Saved me after the fourth time the ice maker in my new frig quit
customer_reviews.author: wayne g. miller

customer_reviews.title: Edgestar portable ice makers are excellent quality, easy to take care of
customer_reviews.text: Edgestar portable ice makers are excellent quality, easy to take care of, and look great in a convenient kitchen/serving area. It blends in perfectly with modern stainless appliances. I enjoy not having ice maker as part of a refrigerator because I can take it outside to the patio in summer or lend it to a friend who needs a constant supply of ice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanene L.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: We use this on our boat and it puts out about 20lbs a day. Works perfect. Some of our marina neighbors have bought one too after seeing ours
customer_reviews.author: Gianna

customer_reviews.title: OMG! LOVE, LOVE, LOVE THIS ICE MAKER
customer_reviews.text: OMG... This just arrived. I read the other reviews (BTW... thank you). I set it on the counter behind our bar for 24 hours prior to plugging it in as mentioned in some of the other reviews; allowing the freon to settle after shipping. I too am an ice muncher (yes, I am severely low on iron... which is one of the side effects of munching ice). The ice is perfect. I reviewed just about every portable ice maker on the market and the qualifiers we required... this was the winner. The different settings are also perfect. I just wish I had bought this 6 months ago. I love, love, love this ice maker.
customer_reviews.author: LisaOnAMission

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MACHINE. Somewhat short life.
customer_reviews.text: WORTH IT. This ice maker worked wonderfully for about 1.5 years. Then it began to struggle and the interior tray cracked, resulting in water leakage and rust. Sad, but the machine still did well running 24/7 for as long as it did.
customer_reviews.author: forensicfan

customer_reviews.title: Wow a great ice maker
customer_reviews.text: Wow a great ice maker, we worried it wouldn't keep up with our demand. We are storing ice in the freezer and turn it off when we have too much. Very happy with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoniac

customer_reviews.title: Great ice maker for weekend parties.
customer_reviews.text: I run this ice maker on my countertop for three days prior to a weekend party. It takes 13 minutes to produce a tray of bullet cubes. It's easy to use and fits my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C

customer_reviews.title: Good ice machine
customer_reviews.text: Good ice maker, lasted little over one year on continuous use before the water dish started malfunctioning. All in all I feel that I've gotten my moneys worth from this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Faye-Marie Evanson

customer_reviews.title: works good, but had some issues with the saying it ...
customer_reviews.text: works good , but had some issues with the saying it was out of water but works now thanks
customer_reviews.author: Donald Rish

customer_reviews.title: buy one
customer_reviews.text: should of bought one of these before now will have one from now on awesome
customer_reviews.author: brian j feeney

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems like you have to refiĺl it a lot and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: David Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: its good and does what it says we unfortunately don't use ...
customer_reviews.text: its good and does what it says we unfortunately don't use as much as we would have thought. great for parties
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recycles melt water
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything, esoecially that recycles water. Been using two years now with not a problem . Best in market!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan A Marks

customer_reviews.title: Love this ice maker
customer_reviews.text: Love this ice maker. The ice is hollow so it's soft when you crunch on it. I bought it for my camper,but love the ice so much I brought it inside my house and use this ice over my refrigerator ice maker.
customer_reviews.author: Vici

customer_reviews.title: Works well. It makes ice quickly, it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. It makes ice quickly, it is a bit noisy and does create hea. Bought it for the camper and it works well, but its hard to sleep with it on, and it makes the camper hotter
customer_reviews.author: Kelly T.

customer_reviews.title: 2 cats and they like ice in their water
customer_reviews.text: This ice maker will provide all the ice you need. We have 4 dogs, 2 cats and they like ice in their water. It is just like having water in a restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: James S. Hull

customer_reviews.title: Am very happy with this ice machine
customer_reviews.text: Am very happy with this ice machine. It works well. It is bigger than I expected it to be and it takes up a big spot on my counter but so far I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: maryd

customer_reviews.title: Works well, quite large for a RV though if ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, quite large for a RV though if you don't have a dedicated area for it. Also, watch running the campground water through it. Some campgrounds draw water from the lake and it isn't filtered.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is the best thing in my kitchen...makes great ice and fast....love it
customer_reviews.author: michael e.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ice maker
customer_reviews.text: This kettle machine puts out some ice. I use refrigerated distilled water and it drops cubes about every 5 minutes. Only had it for a couple weeks but it runs non-stop. And it's quiet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Ice is small medium or large bullets easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Ice is small medium or large bullets easy to munch on without breaking your teeth, quiet, looks good, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: The Edgestar seemed to be a great icemaker, but was too big for the space ...
customer_reviews.text: The Edgestar seemed to be a great icemaker, but was too big for the space I had. Unfortunately, as a result, I needed to return same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought from edge star they only last about 8 months
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very nice commodity to have around the house for gatherings
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the first one I got which unfortunately did not operate but once I received the replacement it has been functioning and providing ice as expected. A very nice commodity to have around the house for gatherings, Steeler House gate parties and camping.
customer_reviews.author: Steve J. Kormanik

customer_reviews.title: I like the color of this one better the last one ...
customer_reviews.text: I had one before that I had to ordered another one cause I couldn't do without it. I like the color of this one better the last one I had was gray.
customer_reviews.author: Enedina Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Make great ice.
customer_reviews.text: This is our third one. They last about 2 years. But if you want dependable ice, these give it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Kraning

customer_reviews.title: Clunker Ice Machine
customer_reviews.text: Although it did make great ice, it only lasted 2 years and 2 months before it stopped making ice. Its no good if it doesn't last longer than this !
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite as big as the one i had before ...
customer_reviews.text: Not Quite as big as the one i had before,so the Ice Hopper Seemed Really Small !! It does make alot of Ice,No Complaint There!
customer_reviews.author: James Sliger

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, it also recycles the melted ice into ...
customer_reviews.text: We used the ice maker with a large group of friends. It held its own. Great machine, it also recycles the melted ice into new cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Blakely

customer_reviews.title: Ice has chemical like taste to it
customer_reviews.text: While it makes ice quickly the ice seems to have a chemical like taste to it.
customer_reviews.author: gregg mashburn

customer_reviews.title: Reliability!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one and I will buy from Edgestar.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Ver Meulen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son's Christmas, says it comes in handy for weekend get togethers
customer_reviews.author: stella alsdurf

customer_reviews.title: Nice little machine
customer_reviews.text: Nice little machine. It does not produce as much ice in a day as it said it would. Fits nicely on the countertop by refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was gift for my daughter's family but they love it. Work very well and very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN F EDRINN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my EdgeStar Portable Ice Maker. It works perfect no problems at all. I would definetly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Merlie

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift but my son and his family really enjoy it and they love how fast it makes ice
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift but my son and his family really enjoy it and they love how fast it makes ice!
customer_reviews.author: DOROTHY A BRYANT

customer_reviews.title: Love it. We use a lot of ice
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We use a lot of ice, as long as you take the ice out it will continuously make ice. It is perfect for my family. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: O. B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeping in mind that it is a small portable ice maker, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: John Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Did not work. When ice was ready to dump ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. When ice was ready to dump it could not get free of the freeze rods to be able to dump. Returned it for credit.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Wart jr

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: The first machine I received did not work, but customer service was great on the return and exchange. The machine is working well and helping us stock up on ice. I use the large size ice cubes and they are perfect for us. We empty ice into baggies and store the ice. It tends to melt together when you first get it out of the machine, so the baggies help to be able to freeze the ice and then drop it on the ground to break the cubes up. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy product
customer_reviews.text: The lid would not close tight. I had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We have a 2 story home and the kitchen is upstairs. My husband is crippled and stays down stairs in his workshop. This ice maker saved my legs from running up and down the stairs to get his icy Coke and tea. It keeps up with the demands of a hot day. Choice settings for different size cubes. I am in love with it!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Day

customer_reviews.title: great machine!
customer_reviews.text: We have used new icemaker now for about 3 weeks and are perfectly happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Judy L. Regelin

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver in Texas heat!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised how much I liked this little ice maker. It keeps up with my 2 person household, and I like lots of Ice here in HOT Texas!! No issues with quality of ice, and love that I can choose the size of the cube...to fit water bottles!
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: The old ice trays work better.
customer_reviews.text: It takes a long time to make any ice. If you put the container of ice in the freezer, it will all be stuck together since it is "wet" since this is not a freezer. I have found if you dump the ice on a cookie sheet and put it in the freezer for a bit, then transfer to you ice bucket it is ok. The old ice trays work better.
customer_reviews.author: Ccd

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes good ice fairly quickly, no complaints. I don' give perfect scores.
customer_reviews.author: clifford bagwell

customer_reviews.title: Was good while it lasted...we'll see if the seller stands by its product
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 90 days and then stopped making ice. We'll see if the seller honors the warranty. It used to make full size ones and now it only makes small flat circles. When working it was nice but only lasting a few months for $150 is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: RSB

customer_reviews.title: but it works well and is great to keep ice for the family in the hot ...
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't the ice I thought it was; but it works well and is great to keep ice for the family in the hot summer months and also great for holiday parties.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: yup... stopped working three weeks ago and ...
customer_reviews.text: yup...stopped working three weeks ago and I bought this in May.2015
customer_reviews.author: rubiedawn

customer_reviews.title: Had problem - but vendor could not have been better
customer_reviews.text: The unit was DOA but THIS VENDOR COULD NOT HAVE BEEN MORE HELPFUL IN GETTING ME A REPLACEMENT. THESE FOLKS ARE TERRIFIC. My replacement works beyond my expectation so I am now quite pleased although it took some time and effort to get it all worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: EdgeStar Portable Ice Maker - Black
product_meta.description: Get rid of those pesky ice trays and add an attractive unit to your countertop with the EdgeStar Black Portable Ice Maker (IP210BL) instead. Compact and portable, you can place this ice maker practically anywhere. Have Ice Fast: You can create ready-to-serve ice in an average of 10 minutes Portable: Perfect for your RV, boat, or small kitchen, this ice maker is compact, portable and works anywhere there is an outlet available Ice Production: Able to make 28 lbs. of small, medium or large bullet ice cubes per day, you won’t have to deal with ice trays ever again Insulated Storage Bin: The integrated storage bin is well-insulated and is able to hold 2.5 lbs. of ice at a time Easy-to-Use Controls: Turn this ice maker on/off and choose your ice size using this unit’s simple touch-sensitive controls Innovative Water-Use Design: This intelligent ice maker will re-use the water resulting from melted ice to then make more ice, saving you time and water resources PLEASE NOTE: While this machine is well-insulated, it is not a freezer.
feature_bullets: Begins producing ice in an average of 10 minutes; Use tap water or bottled water
Soft touch controls; No drain required; Compact size perfect for counter tops
Lightweight and easy to transport; Makes up to 28 pounds of ice per day
Three (3) different ice cube sizes; Ice bin stores 2 1/2 pounds; Excellent for RVs, cabins, boats, etc.
For different color options see IP210RED (red); IP210TI (titanium); IP210SS (stainless steel)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars144 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
